+ Example Preformatted Block

Use "\<\<pre" and "\>\>" lines in order to keep lines formatted as they are:

<<pre
                      ^
                     / \
                    /   \
                   /_____\
                  (       )
                  |       |
                  |       |
                  |       |
                  |       |
                  L_______j
>>
